/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars and buses are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the busy nature of the area. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of human activity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the photograph.
